params.beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to be rewarded

params._fundRecipient: the address of the recipient who will receive the funds allocated for this level

params._beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to be rewarded
params._rewardAmounts: the amounts of the tokens to be send to the beneficiary as reward for each level

returns._0: reward amount claimed by the beneficiary for a level

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newCommunityAdmin: address of the new CommunityAdmin contract

params._newSignerWalletAddress: address of the new backend wallet

LevelFunded(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when a level has been funded

LevelStateChanged(uint256,uint8).notice: Triggered when a level state has been changed

RewardClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Triggered when a reward has been claimed

claimRewardForLevels(address,uint256[],u.notice: Allows beneficiaries to claim the reward for a list of levels using a signature

initialize(address,address).notice: Used to initialize a new CommunityAdmin contract

levelClaims(uint256,address).notice: Returns the reward amount claimed by a beneficiary for a level

levelListAt(uint256).notice: Returns the id of a level from levelList

updateSignerWalletAddress(address).notice: Updates the address of the backend wallet
